Sir,
 
    We looked into the Junit 3.8.1 and went on looking the documents. I quite din't have an idea of implementing them in our software. We are currently using the Robot classes for the data insertion and updation  events.
 
   we love to implement Junit as a testing tool that would provide us best results for UI testing. We just understand abt extending TestCase and including the number of test () methods.
 
   Just help us on how to implement UI testing for a program with some sample source codes and their corresponding test codes. Help needed desperately !!!!!
 
Thanks.
 
Regards,
Vimal.
